<h1 className={"openapi__heading"}>Update Data Pattern</h1>

<MethodEndpoint method={"put"} path={"/dlp/api/v1/dss-api/data-pattern/{patternId}"}></MethodEndpoint>

:::caution deprecated

This endpoint has been deprecated and may be replaced or removed in future versions of the API.

:::

Updates a data pattern.
